title: Kristin Is A Comedian?! + We Weren't Prepared To Answer These Personal Questions
description:
Kristin got the opportunity to use a Twitter joke out in public this week and it didn’t disappoint.
Kristin was at the grocery picking up some medicine. There weren’t many cashiers available, so Kristin found herself in a long line. A guy in the store gets frustrated with the long lines and lack of service and begins yelling in the store making others uncomfortable.
While Kristin is leaving, she sees that same guy getting into his Tesla.
Kristin recently came across a Twitter joke instructing people to say the silliest thing to Tesla owners to make them upset.
This was the perfect opportunity for Kristin. She felt that since the guy was being an a*hole to the store employees, she’d do the same and push his buttons a little. You’d never guess what she said to him!
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: Pionaire Podcasting
